title: Conjunctures: Medieval Studies in Honor of Douglas Kelly
abstract: Preface. Publications of Douglas Kelly. Emmanuele BAUMGARTNER: La preparation a la Queste del Saint Graal dans le Tristan en prose. Bart BESAMUSCA and Frank BRANDSMA: Between Audience and Source: the First-Person Narrator in the Middle Dutch Lanceloet. Glyn S. BURGESS: The Role of the Heart in the Lai de l'Ombre and the Chastelaine de Vergi. Keith BUSBY: Hunbaut and the Art of Medieval French Romance. William C. CALIN: Will the Real Charles of Orleans Please Stand! or Who Wrote the English Poems in Harley 682? Robert F. COOK: The Arthurian Interlude in the Batard de Bouillon. Colette-Anne van COOLPUT: Auto-portraits de heros. Peter F. DEMBOWSKI: Textual and Other Problems of the Epilogue of Erec et Enide. Albert GIER: L'Amour, les monologues: le Lai de Narcisse. Stacey L. HAHN: Genealogy and Adventure in the Cyclic Prose Lancelot. Tony HUNT: Chretien's Prologues Reconsidered. Sylvia HUOT: Languages of Love: Vernacular Motets on the Tenor Flos Filius Eius. Sandra NESS IHLE: Invention of Character in Malory's Grail Book. Catherine M. JONES: Blazon and Allegory in the Livre du Cuer d'Amours Espris. Hans-Erich KELLER: La structure du Roman de la Poire. Elspeth KENNEDY: The Narrative Techniques Used. To Give Arthurian Romance a Historical Flavour. Christopher KLEINHENZ: The Quest Motif in Medieval Italian Literature. Erik KOOPER: Multiple Births and Multiple Disaster: Twins in Medieval Literature. Norris J. LACY: Motivation and Method in the Burgundian Erec. Ullrich LANGER: Humanism's Antidote to Romance: L'amant resuscite de la mort d'amour (1555). Donald MADDOX: Coutumes et 'conjointure' dans le Lancelot en prose. Dhira B. MAHONEY: Ar ye a knyght and ar no lovear?: The Chivalry Topos in Malory's Book of Sir Tristram. Emanuel J. MICKEL: The Language of Illogic. Jan MIERNOWSKI: L'alchimie du Roman de la Rose et les limites de l'allegorie. James J. MURPHY: The Discourse of the Future: Toward an Understanding of Medieval Literary Theory. Richard O'GORMAN: Robert de Boron's Joseph d'Arimathie and the Sacrament of Penance. William D. PADEN: Christine de Pizan as a Reader of the Medieval Pastourelle. Linda M. PATERSON: Marcabru's Rhetoric and the Dialectic of trobar. Ans que.l terminis verdei (PC 293.7) and Jaufre Rudel. Rupert T. PICKENS: Villon on the Road to Paris: Contexts and Intertexts of Huitain XIII of the Testament. Elizabeth W. POE: Segom quem soce per semblan: Auctorial Interventions in Arnaut Vidal's Guilhem de la Barra and Their Relation to His Sources. Jacques RIBARD: Jehan et Blonde: mythe ou realite? Paul V. ROCKWELL: Twin Mysteries: Ceci n'est pas un Fresne. Rewriting Resemblance in Galeran de Bretagne. Barbara N. SARGENT-BAUR: Truth-claims as captatio benevolentiae in Villon's Testament. Sara STURM-MADDOX: Letres escrites i a: The Marvellous Inscribed. Jane H.M. TAYLOR: The Parrot, the Knight and the Decline of Chivalry. Karl D. UITTI: Chretien de Troyes's Cliges: Romance Translatio and History. Lenora D. WOLFGANG: Chretien's Lancelot: the Fragments in Manuscript 6138 of the Institut de France. Friedrich WOLFZETTEL: Artus en cage: quelques remarques sur le roman arthurien et l'histoire. Michel ZINK: Note sur la rivalite et la jalousie dans le Tristan de Thomas.
